content: MOSCOW  Nov 14 Russia's top mobile phone operator MTS  said on Tuesday its third quarter net profit was up 43 percent to 18 billion roubles ($301.4 million)  year-on-year.
name: Mobile TeleSystems OJSC
title: Russia's MTS Q3 net profit up 43 pct to 18 bln rbls  y/y

content: MOSCOW  Oct 23 Russia's largest telecoms operator MTS said on Monday it would purchase equipment from Sweden's Ericsson for 400 million euros  ($470.16 million) to modernise its network.
name: Mobile TeleSystems OJSC
title: RPT-Russia's MTS to purchase Ericsson equipment for 400 mln euros

content: MOSCOW  Sept 29 Russia's top mobile phone operator MTS said on Friday it had been forced to suspend services in the Central Asian republic of Turkmenistan after the state telecoms provider cut it off from its network.
name: Mobile TeleSystems OJSC
title: Russia's MTS cut off in Turkmenistan  suspends mobile service

content: MOSCOW  Sept 13 MTS  the leading telecommunications provider in Russia  says Stream Digital  LLC  the company's wholly-owned subsidiary  purchased a total 1 197 430 MTS shares of common stock  representing 0.06 percent of share capital issued by MTS.
name: Mobile TeleSystems OJSC
title: BRIEF-Russia's MTS says subsidiary buys 0.06 pct of its share capital

content: MOSCOW  Sept 5 A Russian court has turned down business conglomerate Sistema's appeal against the "arrest" of its shares in mobile operator MTS and Medsi chain of medical clinics  the Interfax news agency reported on Tuesday.
name: Mobile TeleSystems OJSC
title: Russian court turns down Sistema's appeal to lift 'arrest' of shares in MTS  Medsi -Ifx

content: MOSCOW Russian conglomerate Sistema  said on Wednesday it had no plans to reduce its stake in mobile phone operator MTS  to pay oil giant Rosneft  a $2 billion settlement and would be able to raise the funds from banks.
name: Mobile TeleSystems OJSC
title: Russia's Sistema says no plans to cut stake in MTS to pay Rosneft

content: MOSCOW  Aug 28 Russia's biggest mobile operator MTS raised its full-year profit forecast on Monday and confirmed plans to pay 52 billion roubles ($890 million) in dividends during 2017.
